pullrequest.title: Explicitly set the cmake_minimum_required policy version for package config files

content.raw:
It seems that `cmake_minimum_required(~)` only affects the current cmake policy settings and does not leave any visible indication of what version was passed to it (at least, I can't find anything in the documentation to suggest that we can identify what version number it was called with).

That being the case, I've made changes in 1dcd48d so that we explicitly set the version number. The only downside to this is we need to remember to bump this whenever we decide to change the minimum cmake version that we use.
